name: blesta/ispapi
description: The ISPAPI Registrar Module for BLESTA

scripts.codeCheck: phpcs --ignore="*/vendor/*" --standard=./phpcs.xml.dist --extensions=php,pdt -q -n --colors apis config language views ispapi.php
scripts.codeFix: phpcbf --ignore="*/vendor/*" --standard=./phpcs.xml.dist --extensions=php,pdt -q apis config language views ispapi.php
